mapper.select: SELECT tlal.ip, COUNT(tlal.ip) AS count FROM t_link tl INNER JOIN t_link_access_logs tlal ON tl.full_short_url = tlal.full_short_url WHERE tl.gid = #{param.gid} AND tl.del_flag = '0' AND tl.enable_status = '0' AND tlal.create_time BETWEEN #{param.startDate} and #{param.endDate} GROUP BY tl.gid, tlal.ip ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT SUM(old_user) AS oldUserCnt, SUM(new_user) AS newUserCnt FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(tlal.create_time)) > 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS old_user, CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(tlal.create_time)) = 1 AND MAX(tlal.create_time) >= #{param.startDate} AND MAX(tlal.create_time) < #{param.endDate} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS new_user FROM t_link tl INNER JOIN t_link_access_logs tlal ON tl.full_short_url = tlal.full_short_url WHERE tlal.full_short_url = #{param.fullShortUrl} AND tl.gid = #{param.gid} AND tl.enable_status = #{param.enableStatus} AND tl.del_flag = '0' GROUP BY tlal.user ) AS user_counts;

SELECT COUNT(tlal.user) AS pv, COUNT(DISTINCT tlal.user) AS uv, COUNT(DISTINCT tlal.ip) AS uip FROM t_link tl INNER JOIN t_link_access_logs tlal ON tl.full_short_url = tlal.full_short_url WHERE tl.gid = #{param.gid} AND tl.del_flag = '0' AND tl.enable_status = '0' AND tlal.create_time BETWEEN #{param.startDate} and #{param.endDate} GROUP BY tl.gid;

SELECT tlal.* FROM t_link tl INNER JOIN t_link_access_logs tlal ON tl.full_short_url = tlal.full_short_url WHERE tl.gid = #{param.gid} AND tl.del_flag = '0' AND tl.enable_status = '0' AND tlal.create_time BETWEEN #{param.startDate} and #{param.endDate} ORDER BY tlal.create_time DESC
